languages.text: "Старик Вайс так рьяно меня обвинял во всех ненастьях, а сам оказался ничуть не лучше! Варп никого не щадит, выжег ты себе глаза или нет".
"For every bad thing that ever happened, old Weisz was always there to blame me for it — who's the troublemaker now, eh? The warp, it spares no one, burnt eyes or no."
languages.original_text: "Старик Вайс так рьяно меня обвинял во всех ненастьях, а сам оказался ничуть не лучше! Варп никого не щадит, выжег ты себе глаза или нет".

traits.locale_text: "For every bad thing that's ever happened, old Weisz was always there to blame me for it — and now who's the troublemaker, huh? The warp, it spares nobody, burnt eyes or no."
"For every bad thing that's ever happened, old Weisz was always there to blame me for it — and now who's the troublemaker, huh? The warp, it spares nobody, burnt eyes or no."

"For every bad thing that ever happened, old Weisz was always there to blame me for it — who's the troublemaker now, eh? The warp, it spares no one, burnt eyes or no."

languages.text: "Wann immer etwas Negatives geschehen ist, hat der alte Weisz immer mir die Schuld daran gegeben. Wer ist nun der Unruhestifter, hm? Der Warp verschont niemanden, verbrannte Augen hin oder her."
languages.original_text: "For every bad thing that ever happened, old Weisz was always there to blame me for it — who's the troublemaker now, eh? The warp, it spares no one, burnt eyes or no."

traits.locale_text: "Wann immer etwas Negatives geschehen ist, hat der alte Weisz immer mir die Schuld daran gegeben. Wer ist nun der Unruhestifter, hm? Der Warp verschont niemanden, verbrannte Augen hin oder her."

languages.text: « Au moindre pépin, ce vieux barbon de Weisz me faisait toujours porter le chapeau... Et maintenant, qui c'est, le fauteur de troubles, hein ? Qu'on ait les yeux brûlés ou pas, le Warp n'épargne rien ni personne. »
languages.original_text: "For every bad thing that ever happened, old Weisz was always there to blame me for it — who's the troublemaker now, eh? The warp, it spares no one, burnt eyes or no."

traits.locale_text: « Au moindre pépin, ce vieux barbon de Weisz me faisait toujours porter le chapeau... Et maintenant, qui c'est, le fauteur de troubles, hein ? Qu'on ait les yeux brûlés ou pas, le Warp n'épargne rien ni personne. »

languages.text: «Siempre que pasaba algo malo, el viejo Weisz estaba para echarme la culpa. ¿Y ahora quién está dando problemas? ¿Eh? La disformidad no perdona a nadie, con ojos quemados o sin ellos».
languages.original_text: "For every bad thing that ever happened, old Weisz was always there to blame me for it — who's the troublemaker now, eh? The warp, it spares no one, burnt eyes or no."

traits.locale_text: «Siempre que pasaba algo malo, el viejo Weisz estaba para echarme la culpa. ¿Y ahora quién está dando problemas? ¿Eh? La disformidad no perdona a nadie, con ojos quemados o sin ellos».

languages.text: 「悪いことが起こるたびに、ワイズはいつも私のせいにした。でも、本当のトラブルメーカーは誰だと思う？<歪み>は、目を焼かれていようがいまいが、誰にも容赦しないわ」
languages.original_text: "For every bad thing that ever happened, old Weisz was always there to blame me for it — who's the troublemaker now, eh? The warp, it spares no one, burnt eyes or no."

traits.locale_text: 「悪いことが起こるたびに、ワイズはいつも私のせいにした。でも、本当のトラブルメーカーは誰だと思う？<歪み>は、目を焼かれていようがいまいが、誰にも容赦しないわ」

languages.text: “以前不管发生了什么麻烦，老威茨总是把锅甩到我头上。现在看看，谁才是惹麻烦的家伙，呵？亚空间不会放过任何人，不管你眼睛是不是烧瞎了。”
languages.original_text: "For every bad thing that ever happened, old Weisz was always there to blame me for it — who's the troublemaker now, eh? The warp, it spares no one, burnt eyes or no."

traits.locale_text: “以前不管发生了什么麻烦，老威茨总是把锅甩到我头上。现在看看，谁才是惹麻烦的家伙，呵？亚空间不会放过任何人，不管你眼睛是不是烧瞎了。”

languages.original_text: "For every bad thing that ever happened, old Weisz was always there to blame me for it — who's the troublemaker now, eh? The warp, it spares no one, burnt eyes or no."

languages.text: "İhtiyar Weisz, bugüne kadar ne kötülük yaşandıysa hepsinin suçunu üstüme atardı. Şimdi baş belası olan kimmiş? Öteboyut, gözü yanık olsa da olmasa da kimsenin gözünün yaşına bakmaz."
languages.original_text: "For every bad thing that ever happened, old Weisz was always there to blame me for it — who's the troublemaker now, eh? The warp, it spares no one, burnt eyes or no."
